Header: Bulgarian tourist dies in Sea-side hotel
Content: A 28 year-old Bulgarian tourist has died in a tourist hotel in Moragolla, Aluthgama. She has visited Sri Lanka to receive Aurvedic treatments and had planned to stay until 15 th February. The hotel management has sought Police assistance as the visitor has not opened the room door for hours and found her dead when the door has been opened by the hotel staff in front of Police officers. The Magistrate examination of the deceased foreigner has been held yesterday while the post-mortem examination is scheduled to be held today.
